extDesc.message: Taxinomos is a Chrome Extension, designed to be the front-end for the classification of domains.

error_msg_default.message: There seems to be a problem with the server connection. Make sure that the credentials were entered correctly!

error_msg_setup.message: There seems to be a problem with the server connection. Make sure that the server address you entered was correct and that your device is connected to the internet.
error_msg_setup.description: The error message that is displayed if the /categories or /statuses rest api call return an error

error_msg_401.message: Please make sure that the Bearer Token you entered is correct!
error_msg_401.description: The error message that is displayed on a 401 error

error_msg_404.message: The server could not find the requested resource. Please contact your network administrator.
error_msg_404.description: The error message that is displayed on a 404 error

error_msg_connErr.message: There seems to be a problem with the server connection. Please contact your network administrator or try again later.
error_msg_connErr.description: The error message that is displayed ontimeout or onerror

go_to_settings.message: Please navigate to the settings and make sure your credentials are correct!
go_to_settings.description: This text is displayed additionally on error message, when a server error occurs after the extension has been configured successfully already

label_server_url.description: Text of the label for the server_url input txt

label_token.description: Text of the label for the bearer_token input txt

img_info_cred.message: If you do not have any credentials contact your administrator.
img_info_cred.description: Title of the little info image in the credentials view

button_next_title_cred.description: Title of the 'next'-button in the credentials view

title_working_language.message: The following language will be used as a working language:

img_info_working_language.message: To change the working language you have to change Chrome's default language (enter chrome://settings/languages into your url bar)
img_info_working_language.description: Title of the working language info img in the 'languages'-view

title_sec_language.message: I also understand the following languages:
title_sec_language.description: Title of the secondary languages in the 'languages'-view

img_info_sec_language.message: Add the languages you are able to understand!
img_info_sec_language.description: Title of the secondary languages info img in the 'languages'-view

btn_next_title_language.description: Title of the next-button in the 'languages'-view

title_fin.description: Title for the 'finished'-view , when it's loading the categories/statuses

message_fin.message: This might take a moment. Do not close the Plug-in!
message_fin.description: Text for the 'finished'-view body, when it's loading the categories/statuses

title_fin_loaded.description: Text for the 'finished'-view title, when it's done loading

message_fin_loaded.description: Text for the 'finished'-view body, when it's done loading

settings_title.description: Title for the settings in the 'startup'-view

message_startup.description: Text of the body in the 'startup'-view

home.description: Title of the home-button in the measurement-view

edit_mainCat.description: Title of the main category cell at the summary page in the 'selection'-view

edit_subcat.description: Title of the subcategory cell at the summary page in the 'selection'-view

btn_unsure_title.message: Click this button if you are not sure which category to select!

btn_noncomprende_title.message: Click this button if you are unable to understand the website's language!

btn_exit_title.message: Did you land on a disturbing site? Use this button as an emergency exit!

confidence_title.message: Tell us how confident you are about this classification!
confidence_title.description: Title of the selection.js confidence section

confidence_heading.description: Text of the heading for the confidence rating system

confidence_title_disabled.description: Title of the disabled confidence interface in the 'selection'-view

confidence_title_enabled.message: How confident are you about your classification? Choose one to five stars (one = very unconfident, five = very confident)
confidence_title_enabled.description: Title of the enabled confidence interface in the 'selection'-view

no_subcat.Description: Displayed at the summary of the 'selection'-view when there is no corresponding subcategory available for a selected main category
